Here are all 4 Water Boys (ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¦ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â©ÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã‚Â¼ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¿ÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã‚Â¼ÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã…â€œÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã‚Â¼ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¤ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Âº) productions:

2005 - Water Boys 2005 Summer (ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¦ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â©ÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã‚Â¼ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¿ÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã‚Â¼ÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã…â€œÃƒÂ£Ã†â€™Ã‚Â¼ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¤ÃƒÂ£Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚ÂºÃƒÂ£Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€šÂ¬ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¼Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¼Ã‚ï¿½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¼Ã‚ï¿½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¼Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ÃƒÂ¥Ã‚Â¤Ã‚ï¿½) - 2 part series special

English subtitles included. Also for completion is a Fukuyama Masaharu soundtrack theme. I know there's more soundtrack material out there-- if you have any, send it my way and I'll include it in a new collection.

The broken-up .avi's can be joined on a Unix filesystem command line with the 'cat' command, like this:
"cat file.avi.001 file.avi.002 file.avi.003 file.avi.004 > file.avi" (without the quotes)
There's probably some freeware program for Windows that can accomplish the same.

I downloaded all these from various places and don't claim the original rips or subtitle work as my own. I just wanted to share my whole collection as a tribute to all the cute, Asian boys in speedos everywhere, and to those that appreciate them. ;)
